text: During the download of many files, a significant time is spent waiting for the response of a server in the initial negotiation of the download. We could download in parallel using a thread. Something as simple as a joblib loop with the threading backend and something like 4 jobs would probably be enough to gain a lot.
title: Asynchronous downloads
